name: Crunchy Caramel Pumpkin Bites
preparation:
1. In a 9” x 13” baking dish, make cheesecake according to package directions. Cool, and cut into 2-bite squares.
  2. While cheesecake cools, in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup, combine sauce ingredients. Bring to a gentle boil over medium heat for 3 minutes.
  3. Fold sauce into popcorn. Once cooled, crunch up into slightly smaller pieces. Sprinkle on top of the cheesecake squares, and serve.
tips:
Gently press caramel popcorn into the cheesecake, so it adheres better. 

For crunchier popcorn, spread carmelized popcorn on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner, and toast for 10 minutes in a 300° F (150° C) oven.
